title: How to Draw an Anime Paper Doll

steps.headline: Draw the character or animal in a simple outfit like a T-shirt and shorts.
steps.description: Be sure the doll isn't too small so that it's almost impossible to cut out.

steps.headline: When you are done with the basic doll, slide the other piece of paper on top of the doll.
steps.description: Draw the first outfit on the doll like you would place it on the doll when you are playing.

steps.headline: Draw some more outfits for the doll.
To make the doll even more cool, draw the hair short like a boy and make different hairstyles like you would do the clothes.
Color your doll and clothes.
steps.description: Colored pencils and markers are best because most crayons are too thick to get tiny detail.

steps.headline: Touch up your doll by erasing all of the stray pencil marks and smudges.
Scan your paper doll and give copies to friends or put them on a website.
steps.description: Or, if you're too impatient to play, cut out the doll, accessories, pets, whatever and have fun!

steps.headline: Glue cardboard to the shape of the doll to make it sturdier.

Scan your paper doll and give copies to friends or put them on a website. Or, if you're too impatient to play, cut out the doll, accessories, pets, whatever and have fun! Glue cardboard to the shape of the doll to make it sturdier.
